Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute at Jackson/Central
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Madison, Laramie and Jackson: due to, street blockage near Jackson/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Madison, Laramie and Jackson: due to, street blockage near Jackson/Central.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute near Jackson/Central
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses temp. rerouted near Jackson/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Jackson/Central, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via Jackson, Central, Madison, Laramie, Jackson, and resume normal route.

Westbound buses will operate via Jackson, Laramie, Madison, Central, Jackson,  and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Northbound #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute near Milwaukee/Oakley
ShortDescription: Northbound 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted near Milwaukee/Oakley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Damen, Armitage, Milwaukee, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Oakley.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running with delays near Washington/Wells.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with residual delays and have resumed normal service.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green and Orange Line Service Delayed near Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Green and Orange Line trains are standing near Roosevelt due to fire department activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green and Orange Line trains are standing near Roosevelt due to fire department activity.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Service Delayed near Washington/Wells
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are delayed near Washington/Wells. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains will be rerouted to the outer Loop (trains will board and exit on the Brown Line platforms at Washington/Wells, Quincy/Wells, LaSalle/Van Buren, Library, Adams/Wabash, Washington/Wabash, State/Lake and Clark/Lake).

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
